Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Drive out the abysmal beings from Cultists' Refuge.

Focus on the {@LinkCreature:489#3610#mercenary snipers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3705#mercenary defenders}, {@LinkCreature:489#3706#mercenary ravagers}, {@LinkCreature:489#3708#mercenary prelates}, and {@LinkCreature:489#3709#mercenary arcanists}.

Report to Raubelak when mission is complete.
Great job. Please continue to help the federation to fully eradicate the Cultists.
I will not live under the same sky as the cultists. Wipe them out as fast as you can.
